Warforged Resolve.name: Warforged Resolve
Warforged Resolve.flavor: It’s difficult to take you down, even when you’re faltering.
Warforged Resolve.effect: You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level and can make a saving throw against one effect on you that deals ongoing damage. If you are bloodied, you also regain hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level.
